docs.snippet: The Emerald Inn, which survived as its Upper West Side neighborhood reinvented itself with pricier and pricier stores, is to close April 30 after 70 years....
docs.abstract: The Emerald Inn, which survived as its Upper West Side neighborhood reinvented itself with pricier and pricier stores, is to close April 30 after 70 years.

docs.snippet: A robbery string that focused on Chinese residents thrust into violent relief a demographic trend in the last decade....
docs.lead_paragraph: A robbery string that focused on Chinese residents thrust into violent relief a demographic trend in the last decade.
docs.abstract: Robbery pattern in East Harlem brings unique challenges for uptown precincts of New York Police Department, as all eight victims are Chinese; police reassign some of its 149 Chinese-speaking officers to East Harlem from Chinatown; robberies also illuminate demographic change in East Harlem, where population of Asian residents has quietly ballooned in last decade.

headline.seo: Chinese Moving to East Harlem, Some From Chinatown
headline.main: Chinese Moving to East Harlem in a Quiet Shift From Downtown
headline.print_headline: Chinese Moving to East Harlem In a Quiet Shift From Downtown

byline.contributor: Jeffrey E. Singer and Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting.
